channel.title: Vps Linux help
channel.description:
pleas can some one convert this to a Linux shell script for me i need to change it to that before it will run :( [code]@echo off title Last-Battle java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat exit[/code]
and the name is [code]Run-Server.bat[/code]

item.title: Vps Linux help
item.dc:creator: @tiylord tiylord
item.description:
@tiylord wrote:

pleas can some one convert this to
a Linux shell script for me i need to change it to that before it will run

@echo off title Last-Battle java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat exit

and the name is Run-Server.bat
